w. Material 
was sought that described their content, with particular focus on quantitative measures of 
outcome and of programme coverage and resources. Some characteristics of 32 programmes 
were extracted, and detailed case studies developed for 21 of these based on availability of 
information (see Annex 3). Outcome evaluation data and resource estimates were considered 
adequate for 11 of these (see Tables II-3 and II-4). The resource indicators chosen were (a) 
CHNWs per 1000 participants
